title: Halloween Pumpkin watch face
summary: Trick or Treat - Free Halloween watch face with pumpkin +creepy special effects.
description: Your halloween watch face with halloween pumpkin and creepy effects.The next halloween party is already planned but you don't have a costume yet? No Problem! The Optimus Byte Halloween Pumpkin Watchface is the best you can wear! You will be the eye catcher with this creepy watch face. It doesn't matter if you are in animated / regular or ambient mode, both are looking fabulously and it is a very, very cool and creepy watch face. Trick or treat! Get ready for the halloween party with this creepy watch face.The following features are included:✔ Ready for Halloween, trick or treat! ✔ Countdown until Halloween✔ Optimized for round and square smartwatches✔ 24h and 12h mode✔ Ready to use, no configuration necessary to use the watch face✔ Highly optimized Ambient mode for extended battery life✔ Decent ambient, animated and colorful regular mode✔ Watchface support, just contact usAll android wear watches are supported, f.ex.: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch, Fossil Q Founder, Casio WSD-F10 and Tag Heuer Connected. Watchfaces by Optimusbyte Wearable AppsMore OptimusByte Apps:https://goo.gl/So0Y8aWebsite:http://optimusbyte.com/Optimusbyte on Google+:https://plus.google.com/+OptimusbyteOptimusByte on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/OptimusByte/
descriptionHTML:
Your halloween watch face with halloween pumpkin and creepy effects.
The next halloween party is already planned but you don't have a costume yet? No Problem! The Optimus Byte Halloween Pumpkin Watchface is the best you can wear! You will be the eye catcher with this creepy watch face. It doesn't matter if you are in animated / regular or ambient mode, both are looking fabulously and it is a very, very cool and creepy watch face. Trick or treat! Get ready for the halloween party with this creepy watch face.

The following features are included:
✔ Ready for Halloween, trick or treat!
✔ Countdown until Halloween
✔ Optimized for round and square smartwatches
✔ 24h and 12h mode
✔ Ready to use, no configuration necessary to use the watch face
✔ Highly optimized Ambient mode for extended battery life
✔ Decent ambient, animated and colorful regular mode
✔ Watchface support, just contact us

All android wear watches are supported, f.ex.:
Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch, Fossil Q Founder, Casio WSD-F10 and Tag Heuer Connected.
Watchfaces by Optimusbyte Wearable Apps

recentChanges: 12h/24h sets the right time format depending on local settings
